Pensacola.Lavalle House:
The Lavalle House (also known as the Charles Lavalle House) is a historic house located at 203 East Church Street in Pensacola, Florida.


== Description and history ==
Built in 1805, the Charles Lavalle House is part of Historic Pensacola Village, and features a French Creole period style. Tours focus on Pensacola's history as a Spanish colony.
